title: Extension methods dispatch based on static type
The static (compile-time) type is used rather than the dynamic (run-time type) to match parameters.

inline_content.Text: The static (compile-time) type is used rather than the dynamic (run-time type) to match parameters.

title: Also the dispatch based on static type does not allow an extension method to be called on a
